data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Paro, Bhutan that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Paro, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Paro, Bhutan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 will die without Jesus in the next month in Paro, Bhutan.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 11,396, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Paro, Bhutan that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Adap people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, please give the 23 believers in the state of Paro the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Paro that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Paro, Bhutan.

location.name: Paro
location.people_groups_list: Walang, Badaik, Gongduk, Bodo (Muslim traditions), Bhotia Sikkim
